forecast.name: Washington's Birthday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. Northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle hush blankets the streets, offering a tranquil interlude between the bustling rhythms of the city. The sun peeks intermittently through a canopy of clouds, casting a soft light that dances on the rooftops and glimmers upon the bay. Expect a high of 57, slowly descending into the cool embrace of late afternoon, while a light west-northwest breeze stirs the leaves, whispering secrets of the ocean. The fog, always a friend to this city, lingers at the horizons, a curtain that hints at mystery, yet allows for glimpses of the iconic skyline.

As evening approaches, the clouds will part slightly, settling into a cool calm with temperatures dipping to around 45 degrees. An inviting layer of clouds promises a cozy backdrop for a quiet night ahead. Dressing in layers, perhaps a light jacket over a long-sleeved shirt, will ensure comfort as evening winds pick up. This serene setting invites one to enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps savor a cup of coffee in a snug café, where the clatter of cups harmonizes with the hum of conversation. The muted yet vivid colors of the day make it an ideal time to explore the quieter corners of the city, each step echoing with the stories of those who have walked before.
